doc:
Peggy Simpson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peggy_Simpson 0 Peggy Simpson (4 July 1913 in Leeds, West Riding of Yorkshire – January 1994 in London) was a British actress. She appeared twice for director Alfred Hitchcock in The 39 Steps (1935) and Young and Innocent (1937). Peggy_Simpson ( 4_July_1913 in Leeds , West_Riding of Yorkshire – January 1994 in London ) was a_British_actress . She appeared twice for director_Alfred_Hitchcock in The_39_Steps ( 1935_) and Young_and_Innocent_(_1937_) .
